module.name: fpg_constants
module.short: All constants used in fpGUI are defined here

descr.p: . All the text constants defined here, are also the ones that get translated to multiple languages. Currently fpGUI has translations for:

ul.li: English (default language - but is user selectable)

descr.p: To change the default (compiled in) language used by fpGUI, simply enabled one of the language DEFINES in the interface section of the fpg_constants unit.
For more details on changing the default language of fpGUI Toolkit, see the topic "Changing the default language".

element.name: fpgAddColon
element.short: A utility function to add a colon at the correct location in a string
element.descr: . This is so that when fpGUI supports LTR and RTL languages, the colon will be added at the correct place.

element.name: DEFAULT_HINT_PAUSE
element.short: Default pause in milliseconds before a hint is displayed

element.name: DOUBLECLICK_MS
element.short: Time maximum time in milliseconds between left-clicks for a double click to be triggered

element.name: DOUBLECLICK_DISTANCE
element.short: Maximum distance a mouse pointer can move between two left-clicks and still trigger a double click event
